wikipedia_page.main: William Hutchinson (July 1870 – July 1943) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Stoke.

response: * Billy Hutchinson (rugby league) (1913–1994), English rugby league footballer who played in the 1930s and 1940s
* Billy Hutchinson (footballer, born 1870) (1870–1943), English footballer for Stoke
* Billy Hutchinson (1930s footballer) (active 1930s), English footballer for Bournemouth, Darlington, Halifax
